text:
Hi,

Have any of you faced this problem, I am using the native Menu module in breadcrumbs mode.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/cms/hubl/tags/standard-tags#menu>

The module was embedded on the blog template, and everything works fine for the base language at the moment when I create a language version of this post breadcrumbs stops working - nothing is displayed there
